3: What are you going to do? Nothing will work against me! Don't you understand?
Everyone was doing their best against the King and his guards, but no one could land the last hit.
What's going on? He already has an HP bar, but we still can't beat him!
Camu, Vera!
Don't blame us. This is very normal.

4: Is this also a system feature?

3: Why else would we let Liv create the real artifact?
Right. Some NPCs cannot be defeated by players even if they have an HP bar. The system will 'lock' their health.
The artifact may not be complete, but I already have power! Once I take your artifact away, I will become perfect!
Now die!
Defend yourselves!
Everybody followed Lucia's order to scatter while continuing to give the King pressure.
Hey, what about me!? Liv and I finally got the real artifact, but what shall I do next!?
Do you really have to ask us? You were the one who used it!
Oh!
The Demon King suddenly remembered something and lifted his head... Well, his entire body was a 'head.'
He immediately turned to Liv, who was holding the artifact cluelessly.
Liv, point the artifact at me, then shout out the name of the mightiest person!
What? The mightiest person?
Yes. Then I'll be able to transform into that person and gain the power to control the system.

4: Can't you just turn into your old form?

3: I already forgot what I looked like when I turned into this. I can only count on you, heroes!
I already forgot what I looked like when I became like this. I can only count on you, heroes!
The name of the mightiest person... Hmm.
It seemed to be the most difficult question to Liv. Others might have an answer immediately, but she always saw everybody as equal.
Roarrrr!
The King's attacks intensified. The heroes could still hold him, but if they could not land the last hit, it would only be a matter of time before they lost.
Liv!
Um... The mightiest...
Overlord... Right, this is the 'Land of Overlord.' The Overlord must be the mightiest!
Liv took a deep breath in, then pointed the artifact toward the Demon King and shouted the name.
Overlord Celica!
Wait, why Celica!?
A concerned look appeared on Liv as I asked.
I've been reading Miss Celica's novel recently... So I accidentally...
I had no idea what the novel was about, but the artifact seemed to be working.
Liv was worried that the name she shouted wasn't the best. I told her to trust her choice.
There's no time to waste!
Liv took a deep breath in, then pointed the artifact toward the Demon King and shouted the name.
Celica!!!
Wait, why Celica!?
Knowing that I was baffled by her choice, Liv turned to me and explained.
Miss Celica once said she was the best of best.
The best of best didn't make sense to me, but the artifact seemed to be working.
What is this light...!?
